PackageHeader.Description: This file contains XPDL workflows for Sentinel. $Id: xtt-xsn-xpdl.xml,v 1.2 2006/07/21 17:05:21 cvsbuild Exp $

DataField.Name: XSN_WebAppIPAddress
DataField.Description:
EDIT THIS
Replace this value with the IP address of the web application server.

DataField.Name: XSN_WebAppIPPort
DataField.Description:
EDIT THIS
Replace this value with the IP port of the web application server.

DataField.Name: XSN_WebAppUrlPrefix
DataField.Description:
DO NOT EDIT
This is the url prefix of all the portal applications

DataField.Name: XSN_RedirectUrlPrefix
DataField.Description:
DO NOT EDIT
This is the url prefix to which all redirected requests are sent.

Activity.Name: HTTP 500 error code
Activity.Description: This activity should never be reached.

Tool.Description: Causes a HTTP 500 to be returned. This should not be reached.

Transition.Description: Is the page blocked by the subscriber?

Activity.Name: Is Url Categorized?
Activity.Description: Tests if the categorization is already set

ProcessHeader.Description: This is a sample where blocked recipients get an modified, hopefully invalid value

Application.Name: SystemCategorizor
Application.Description: The Application (Chlet) used to perform MMS categorization

Application.Name: MmsRecipientProcessor
Application.Description: Checks category rights of each of the recipients from a list

Activity.Name: System Categorization
Activity.Description: Calls the CATEGORIZOR chlet to assign a category to the MMS

Activity.Name: System Categorization
Activity.Description: Calls the CATEGORIZOR chlet to assign a category to the MMS
